body:
Comment 7 by **BigBoss1964**: 
> Agreed, bar we all understand, it might not build after all. You're welcome to propose
your change: http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html. Alternatively, I could do it myself.
Just let me know.

As I am the outsider here and the change is small, I will defer to your judgement on
which course is best, and proceed accordingly; thanks :-).
